thread.section_title: Eiffel Saint Charles - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Superb location, very clean
thread.title_full: Superb location, very clean - Review of Eiffel Saint Charles, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Christine H
title: Superb location, very clean
text:
Stayed in February over Valentines Day. Best thing about hotel is location - extremely close to the eiffel tower and to metro stations that took us everywhere we needed to go. Takes just over an hour via public transport to get here from CDG airport.
Rooms were spotlessly clean, bedroom isn't massive but we didn't mind. Large bathroom with great shower.
Only downside would be the noise that came from both the street (we stayed in a room on rue saint-charles) and there was music played from the street until late into the late. Also, the hotel walls are extremely thin -you can hear everything that comes from the neighbouring rooms.
However, overall I would recommend a stay in this hotel for a short visit to Paris
Room Tip: Ask for a room not on rue saint-charles See more room tips
